Articles.Content: apologies if this is the wrong section, but what does the vanilla GameData folder look like? (steam)

Perhaps the Gameplay Tutorials/Questions section? I'll let a mod decide.

I'm not really sure what you mean by 'Vanilla' GameData folder though. As far as I can tell, you're asking what it looks like with all mods removed. In that case, it will have just the 'Squad' folder in it, with all the stock parts and flags.

A picture of what the folder will look like (I don't have the Steam version, so I made a mockup of it):

If you're unsure of where the GameData folder is located, simply follow the directories that are at the top of the image.

Hope this helps!

yeah just wanted mod free, thanks man.

mod can lock this.
